name: Marble Runner Pyramid
description:
Marble Runner Pyramid 

Game in Full 3D environment.

Control your ball : with Finger (Touch) or incline device (Tilt, Maze, Teeter, Labyrinth)

Confront The Pyramid.

Can you reach the top of this pyramid ?

In the Pyramid mode, you start from the base and must climb 25 floors.

25 Levels wait for you therefore.

5 Bosses will stop your progress.

In the multiplayer mode, humiliate your opponents.

You can play with 2, 3 or 4 players in live.

Capitalize your scores in the Pyramid mode, your battles in the multiplayer mode and share.

Follow your progress and your achievements.

Consult the section « Help & More » for more details.

For the rest, to you to play !
